task.title: Update an Address
task.shortdesc: Students are asked to regularly verify and update address information on record with the university through the MyPack Portal student information system.

taskbody.prereq: Address changes are made through MyPack Portal. Users must log in to make changes.

step.cmd: Find the address you wish to update (e.g. ‘Diploma Address,’ ‘Campus Housing Address,’) and click on the address box.
